72582.affected_area: Winnipeg (Alpine Place, Island Lakes, Niakwa Park, Southdale, St. George, & Windsor Park)
72582.summary: Some customers in the Alpine Place, Island Lakes, Niakwa Park, Southdale, St. George, & Windsor Park areas of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
72582.title: Feb 5 - Winnipeg (Alpine Place, Island Lakes, Niakwa Park, Southdale, St. George, & Windsor Park) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
